summary: A gangster in Harlem must rescue his ex-wife, who has been kidnapped by the Mafia.
cast: Fred Williamson|Julius Harris|Gloria Hendry|Margaret Avery|D'Urville Martin|Tony King|Gerald Gordon|Bobby Ramsen|James Dixon|Esther Sutherland|Charles MacGuire|Mindi Miller|Al Kirk|Janelle Webb|William Wellman Jr.
keywords: kidnapping|harlem manhattan new york city|african american|pokies|shot in the street
title: Guerra en Harlem
